title: Ciaphas Cain eBook Collection
description:
The adventures of Commissar Cain, his malodorous aide Jurgen, and the 597th Valhallans have proved great favourites among Black Library fans. Cain is considered to be a hero of the Imperium, and is praised for his deeds of courage in the thick of battle. However, Cain wants only a safe little spot and a small workload Ã¢â‚¬â€œ to live an easy life. But, somehow, Cain always manages to find himself in dangerous military engagements, and is forced to save his own hide Ã¢â‚¬â€œ which tends to further inflate his legendary reputation.

Contains the novels:
For the Emperor
Caves of Ice
The Traitor's Hand
Death or Glory
Duty Calls
Cain's Last Stand
The Emperor's Finest
The Last Ditch
The Greater Good

And the short stories:
Fight or Flight
Echoes of the Tomb
The Beguiling
Sector 13
Traitor's Gambit

All files in epub format, hope you enjoy.
